name: GermanSpaceAlliance
body:
### What is German Space Alliance?
German Space Alliance is a common project from Modders of the [German Kerbal Space Program Community](http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.de/index.php?page=Index). Our aim was to join forces and to create a Mod for the Englisch Community as thanks that you also share your mods with us! Of course this mod wouldn`t exist without the German Community, but our thanks is for you dear Community!
### Credits
   * Thomas P. Kerman
   * Fr3akyHDx
   * Jebediah Kerman
   * runner78
   * Quazar501
   * Aurora
   * DirMa
   * Argo Industries
